items.text: length ball, on off, and slapped away to deep extra cover for a single
yorker on middle, and shoveled down to long on. That's his first ton since March 2018
items.postText: Stirling opens his helmet, kisses the ground, before being congratulated by Porterfield

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and guided to third man for a walking single
length ball on off, and played to the off side for a single
yorker just outside off, and going through to the keeper
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Porterfield, no run

items.text: back of a length, slower ball on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket

items.preText: Eight overs to go. How close to 300 can Ireland get? They have wickets in hand.
items.text: swings across the line and clears midwicket! Length ball from around the wicket, and he flat-bats a pull for six
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Porterfield, SIX runs

items.text: full on middle, but going down leg. Misses the flick, hits his pads and rolls down to fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Porterfield, 1 leg bye

items.text: back of a length, just outside off, and he mistimes a cut to point
items.postText: Badhon007 : "After 40 overs Ireland are 193 , Bangladeshi bowlers recent performance suggests thay will end up in between 260- 270 . If they were thing of 300 its aint gona happened against BD bowlers."

items.text: superlative! Full, on off and angling away. Porterfield frees his arms and slaps a shot through the cover region. Thumped
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Porterfield, FOUR runs

items.text: boy oh boy! Full on middle, and he clears his front leg before hammering a six over cow corner. Ireland beginning their charge
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Porterfield, SIX runs

items.text: moves on to 90 with a cut to deep point
items.postText: Asif: "@Badhon 007- it's nothing to do with the bowlers. It's to do with the nature of the pitch. "

items.preText: Suman: "@Badhon007 - dude, please don't jinx the BD bowlers. But it's pretty sad that this lot can manage only 2 wickets until now! Could you imagine facing the English squad with this bowling attack- the score would be 450+" -- Look at the bright side! You'll face England only once in the World Cup's league stage
items.text: full, on off, and driven down to long off for a single
nice attempted yorker. Lands at the base of middle, and he toe-ends a drive to mid off
back of a length slower ball, lands on middle and goes over Porterfield's bat. Tried to pull, but couldn't get the connection
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Porterfield, no run

items.text: attempted yorker, on leg stump, and he mistimes a nudge to the leg side
low full toss on off, and cracked through the covers to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
low full toss on middle, and mistimed to long off for a single
low full toss, wide outside off, forcing Porterfield to stretch. Mistimed to long on
back of a length on off, and he backs away to make some room. Flat-bats a shot to long on, just a single
items.postText: Saleque Sufi: "Mr Sumon please note that England lost to Bangladesh in World 2011 and 2015. This attack with Mustafiz and Meraj will definitely restrict England "

items.text: full outside off stump, and Porterfield walks across to the off side exposing all three stumps. Tries to drag a slog over midwicket, but the ball hits his leg and rolls away to the third-man boundary for four
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Porterfield, 4 leg byes

items.text: holes out at extra cover! Falls just short of a hundred. This was full and wide outside off, and Porterfield tries to slap it over the off side. But fielder in the deep runs across the boundary line and slides across the grass to complete a catch. Excellent innings

dismissal.text: WTS Porterfield c Liton Das b Abu Jayed 94 (106b 7x4 2x6) SR: 88.67

items.text: full toss on middle, and flicked away to deep midwicket. One bounce to the fielder
items.postText: Mohammad Ratan : "It's very painful for Bangladeshi supporters to see this kind of bawling performance with Ireland. "

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and nudged to the leg side. Vacant spaces there, allowing the duo to come back for the second
hammered over the bowler's head! Length ball, very wide outside off but Stirling does some stand-and-deliver hitting from the base of his crease
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, FOUR runs
